original_text: After Jacob came from Paddan Aram, he arrived safely at the city of Shechem in Canaan and camped within sight of the city.
korean_text: 야곱이 밧단아람에서부터 평안히 가나안 땅 세겜 성읍에 이르러 그 성읍 앞에 장막을 치고

sentences.original_text: After Jacob came from Paddan Aram
he arrived safely at the city of Shechem
and camped within sight of the city
